alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Fernando Valley; Malibu Coast; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 27 at 2:09PM PDT until October 30 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM SATURDAY TO 10 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Beaches, Ventura County Inland Coast, Malibu Coast, Eastern San Fernando Valley and Northern Ventura County Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM Saturday to 10 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Fernando Valley; Malibu Coast; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast
